an10.25:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these ten universal dimensions of meditation.
an10.25:1.3: Someone perceives the meditation on universal earth above, below, across, undivided and limitless.
an10.25:1.4: They perceive the meditation on universal water …
an10.25:1.12: They perceive the meditation on universal consciousness above, below, across, undivided and limitless.
an10.25:1.13: These are the ten universal dimensions of meditation.”
